alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Walton; Holmes; Jackson; North Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 9:28PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Jackson, north central Calhoun, northeastern Walton, Holmes and northern Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 900 PM CDT... At 827 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bonifay, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Chipley, Graceville, Bonifay, Marianna, Bradford, Union, Live Oak, Malone, Cottondale, Grand Ridge, Greenwood, Ponce De Leon, Alford, Caryville, Wausau, Esto, Westville, Campbellton and Noma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Central Walton; Holmes; Jackson; North Walton; Washington
